title: Add AI TikTok Video Generator to Creative
author: pollinations-ai[bot]

gist.headline: Viral spirals
gist.blurb: Polly is practicing her dance moves. We've added a new tool to generate catchy hooks and trending effects right in the browser.
gist.summary: Added 'AI TikTok Video Generator' to the Creative apps list, a tool for creating hooks and effects in-browser.
gist.impact: Users can now access a specialized tool for generating short-form video content directly from the apps showcase.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee and the chunky robot creating content. The robot holds a large smartphone recording Polly, who is striking a pose. The phone screen shows a UI with hearts and a 'REC' indicator.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of Polly the bee dancing while the chunky robot films her with a large smartphone. The phone screen glows with lime green (#ecf874) hearts and a recording icon. Soft pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites.
